note: CME visible to the west in SOHO LASCO C2 and STEREO A COR2. The source is likely an eruption from former AR 14246, which rotated off of the Earth-facing disk on 2025-10-18. Opening field lines and post eruption arcades are visible near the west limb in STEREO A EUV 195 imagery starting at 2025-10-23T13:55Z.
